description: Source code for the website www.casablanca-band.com. I did a full redesign of their website in fall 2022.

title: Lucaskolinger/dreamcapture-v1
description: Older version of a personal Website for a friend of mine who produces movies. It was one of my first bigger projects where I learned a lot of the core concepts especially of CSS, but it were also my first steps learning Vue.js through Nuxt. It was a big playground for me and it's accordingly messy.
